item.description:
Nikki and John will have returned from their trip to Denver and their meeting with Ken, so we look forward to hearing about their time there. We will also be practicing the 3-2-1 Shadow process and will take a look at The Work by Byron Katie.


At Samadhi Yoga.
Potluck: bring some food to share.

If you take the T, it's the Newton Center T-stop, about 2 minute walk to the studio. Newton Center is on the D-branch of the Green Line. The studio is just above and to the right of Pier 1 on Beacon St.

For more information, see http://www.samadhiyog...
item.name: Boston Ken Wilber Group August Meetup
